mapper.sql: select t.flow_id, t.family_id, t.amount, t.txn_type, t.category, t.id, t.transaction_date, t.note, fm.name as member_name, f.family_name from transactions t left join family_members fm on t.family_id = fm.family_id and t.id = fm.id left join families f on t.family_id = f.familie_id
mapper.select: where t.family_id = #{familyId} order by t.transaction_date desc, t.flow_id desc
where t.id = #{memberId} order by t.transaction_date desc, t.flow_id desc
where t.family_id = #{familyId} and t.id = #{memberId} order by t.transaction_date desc, t.flow_id desc

mapper.select: select COALESCE(SUM(amount), 0) from transactions where family_id = #{familyId} and txn_type = #{txnType}
select COUNT(*) from transactions where family_id = #{familyId}
select category as name, COALESCE(SUM(amount), 0) as value, COUNT(*) as count from transactions where family_id = #{familyId} and txn_type = #{txnType} group by category order by value desc

select DATE_FORMAT(transaction_date, '%Y-%m') as month, txn_type, COALESCE(SUM(amount), 0) as amount from transactions where family_id = #{familyId} and transaction_date >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 12 MONTH) group by DATE_FORMAT(transaction_date, '%Y-%m'), txn_type order by month desc, txn_type
select COALESCE(SUM(amount), 0) from transactions where family_id = #{familyId} and id = #{memberId} and txn_type = #{txnType}
select COUNT(*) from transactions where family_id = #{familyId} and id = #{memberId}

select category as name, COALESCE(SUM(amount), 0) as value, COUNT(*) as count from transactions where family_id = #{familyId} and id = #{memberId} and txn_type = #{txnType} group by category order by value desc

select DATE_FORMAT(transaction_date, '%Y-%m') as month, txn_type, COALESCE(SUM(amount), 0) as amount from transactions where family_id = #{familyId} and id = #{memberId} and transaction_date >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 12 MONTH) group by DATE_FORMAT(transaction_date, '%Y-%m'), txn_type order by month desc, txn_type
